projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: Generative AI tool allowing writers to convert their stories into comics and video, Project 2 Title: Mobile application for reading and sharing comics
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Generative AI tool allowing writers to convert their stories into comics and video

Description: Building a multi-step AI system that provides a self-serve capability for

users to adapt their long-form written content into faithful, consistent, and rich visuals.

Skill sets: Interns will be expected to be familiar with pre-training both image and text

models, comfortable with AI-integration frameworks, proficient with data modeling and

have at least a novice understanding of version control

Traits expectation: Effectively communicate complex AI concepts with the non-technical

teammates, efficiently collaborate with other types of tech teammates, and be adaptable

to a constantly evolving landscape.

Expected learning: Working on an AI system in the cloud built to be scalable,

sustainable, and safe.

Specific courses required for project execution: Design & Analysis of Algorithms,

Databases


Project 2 Title: Mobile application for reading and sharing comics


Description: Building an OS-agnostic mobile application with a focus on a content

creation tool, a self-serve upload feature as well as social & discovery elements.

Skill sets: Comfort with the React Native framework, proficient in version control,

experience with implementing responsive designs.

Traits expectation: Able to pivot quickly based on user feedback, opinionated on user

experience.

Expected learning: Hands-on experience in building a product built for a global

audience with a focus on social features and AI integrations
